Class FanRouter

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.draw2d.AbstractRouter

All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionRouter
public class FanRouter
extends AutomaticRouter

Automatic router that spreads its Connections in a fan-like fashion upon collision.
